body_html: @svenfuchs the broken links mentioned in my post above don't appear to be in the summer-of-code repo, although I'm not very familiar with jekyll. could they be getting cached? lib/feed.rb seems to suggest all that's needed is to remove & re-add the source.

body: @svenfuchs the broken links mentioned in my post above don't appear to be in the summer-of-code repo, although I'm not very familiar with jekyll.  could they be getting cached?  lib/feed.rb seems to suggest all that's needed is to remove & re-add the source.
